post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, September 8
post.Content:
Not long now until JavaOne, so I hope everyone that is presenting is getting things sorted out! :-) Here's the weeks links - enjoy! :-)

JavaFX

  • Johan Vos has written about building and deploying Android apps using JavaFX. He also has written about the sessions he is presenting at JavaOne, including a session on JavaFX on Android.
  • Dirk Lemmermann has announced the 1.0.0 release of his (commercial) FlexGantt library.
  • Rob Terp has a post titled "Animations with JavaFX: So Easy a Chimp Can Do It".
  • I continue to post interviews with members of the JavaFX community, this week interviewing David Grieve and Carl Dea.
  • Niels Gundermann continues to work on his JavaFX 3D Editor project, releasing update 11 as well as a blog post detailing how to create new painting tools.

That's all for this week. Catch you again next week!
